casebody.data:
Harold A. STRICKLAND and Mary P. Strickland v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE. No. 8584. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit May 10, 1941. William J. Murray, of Detroit, Mich., for petitioners. Samuel O. Clark, Jr., J. P. Wenchel, and Sewall Key, all of Washington, D. C., for respondent.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

It is ordered that the appeal herein be and the same is dismissed, pursuant to motion of petitioners.
